title: Retiree Pensions Annual Benefit Received
description: Retiree Pension data including the tax year and amount received by member, employee name, member category plan, and retirement date.

columns.name: Member Category for Pension
columns.description: There are five different member categories for pensions payable from SFERS: Miscellaneous (Misc.), Police, Fire, Sheriff, and Miscellaneous Safety. Miscellaneous members include eligible employees of the City and County of San Francisco, the San Francisco Unified School District, the San Francisco Community College District, and the San Francisco Trial Courts. Uniformed employees working for the City’s Police and Fire Departments are covered by the SFERS Police and Fire Plans. The Sheriff, Undersheriff, and deputized personnel of the Sheriff’s Department hired after January 7, 2012 are covered by the SFERS Sheriff’s Plan. Probation Officers, District Attorney Investigators, and Juvenile Court Counselors hired after January 7, 2012 are covered by the SFERS Miscellaneous Safety Plan.

columns.name: Tax Year
columns.description: Tax year in which the beneficiary was paid

columns.name: Retirement Benefits paid in Tax Year
columns.description: Amount paid to the beneficiary in the tax year
